enhanced_description: Altruist India, while a prominent mobile Value Added Services (MVAS) and telecom solutions provider operating in over 50 countries, also offers specialized HR technology solutions. Their HR software and services leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) to address core human resources needs, particularly in talent acquisition and total rewards. The aim is to empower enterprises, especially large and global ones, to hire top talent faster and more efficiently, boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and significantly reduce the overall cost of acquiring qualified employees. This includes solutions for benefits administration.
